title: Digitale Datenspuren nutzbar machen
text:
Weiterf√ºhrende Tutorials

Bail, C. A. (2020, Mai 29). What is Digital Trace Data? Link

Hase, V. (2023, Juli). Data Donations‚ÄîTutorial Automated Content Analysis. Link

Lorenz-Spleen, P., & Jaursch, J. (2023, August). Researcher access to platform data under the DSA: Questions and answers. Link

title: Digitale Datenspuren nutzbar machen
text:
Weiterf√ºhrende Literatur

Araujo, T., Ausloos, J., van Atteveldt, W., Loecherbach, F., Moeller, J., Ohme, J., Trilling, D., van de Velde, B., de Vreese, C., & Welbers, K. (2022). OSD2F: An Open-Source Data Donation Framework. Computational Communication Research, 4(2), 372‚Äì387. Link

Boeschoten, L., Ausloos, J., M√∂ller, J. E., Araujo, T., & Oberski, D. L. (2022). A framework for privacy preserving digital trace data collection through data donation. Computational Communication Research, 4(2), 388‚Äì423. Link

Breuer, J., Kmetty, Z., Haim, M., & Stier, S. (2022). User-centric approaches for collecting Facebook data in the ‚Äòpost-API age‚Äô: Experiences from two studies and recommendations for future research. Information, Communication & Society. Online first publication. Link

Haim, M. & Hase, V. (2023). Computational Methods und Tools f√ºr die Erhebung und Auswertung von Social-Media-Daten. In S. Stollfu√ü, L. Niebling, & F. Raczkowski (Hrsg.), Handbuch Digitale Medien und Methoden. Springer. Link

Haim, M., Leiner, D., & Hase, V. (2023). Integrating Data Donations into Online Surveys. Medien & Kommunikationswissenschaft, 71(1‚Äì2), 130‚Äì137. Link

Keusch, F., & Kreuter, F. (2021). Digital trace data. In U. Engel, A. Quan-Haase, S. X. Liu, & L. Lyberg, Handbook of Computational Social Science, Volume 1 (1. Aufl., S. 100‚Äì118). Routledge. Link

Lazer, D., Hargittai, E., Freelon, D., Gonzalez-Bailon, S., Munger, K., Ognyanova, K., & Radford, J. (2021). Meaningful measures of human society in the twenty-first century. Nature, 595(7866), 189‚Äì196. Link

Ohme, J., Araujo, T., Boeschoten, L., Freelon, D., Ram, N., Reeves, B. B., & Robinson, T. N. (2023). Digital Trace Data Collection for Social Media Effects Research: APIs, Data Donation, and (Screen) Tracking. Communication Methods and Measures. Online first publication. Link

Stier, S., Breuer, J., Siegers, P., & Thorson, K. (2020). Integrating Survey Data and Digital Trace Data: Key Issues in Developing an Emerging Field. Social Science Computer Review, 38(5), 503‚Äì516. Link

van Driel, I. I., Giachanou, A., Pouwels, J. L., Boeschoten, L., Beyens, I., & Valkenburg, P. M. (2022). Promises and Pitfalls of Social Media Data Donations. Communication Methods and Measures. Online first publication. Link
